text.div: • Include codes from http://terminology.hl7.org/CodeSystem/v3-ActCode where concept is-a _ActInformationSensitivityPolicy

name: ActInformationSensitivityPolicy
title: ActInformationSensitivityPolicy
description: ActSensitivity codes are used to bind information to an Act.confidentialityCode according to local sensitivity policy so that those confidentiality codes can then govern its handling across enterprises. Internally to a policy domain, however, local policies guide the access control system on how end users in that policy domain are able to use information tagged with these sensitivity values.
